-- DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_silver_blob
-- DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_gold_blob
-- DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_silver
-- DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_gold
-- DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL cred_pranav
-- DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT format_parquet

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL cred_pranav
WITH 
    IDENTITY = 'Managed identity'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_silver_blob
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://fdaprojectlake.blob.core.windows.net/silver',
    CREDENTIAL = cred_pranav
)

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE source_gold_blob
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://fdaprojectlake.blob.core.windows.net/gold',
    CREDENTIAL = cred_pranav
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT format_parquet
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.extevents
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'extevents',
    DATA_SOURCE = source_gold_blob,
    FILE_FORMAT = format_parquet
)
AS
SELECT * FROM gold.events
